jcr:content.jcr:title: The World of the Partridge Family

contentheadline.headline: The World of the Partridge Family

contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} {{Infobox album <!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject_Albums --> | Name = The World of the Partridge Family | Type = compilation | Artist = [[The Partridge Family]] | Cover = The World of the Partridge Family.jpg | Released = 1974 | Recorded = 1970 - 1973 | Genre = [[Rock music|Rock]] | Length = | Label = [[Bell Records (1950s-70s)|Bell Records]] | Producer = [[Wes Farrell]] | Reviews = | Last album = ''[[Bulletin Board (album)|Bulletin Board]]''<br/>(1973) | This album = ''The World of the Partridge Family''<br/>(1974) | Next album = ''[[Greatest Hits (Partridge Family)|Greatest Hits]]''<br/>(1989) }} '''''The World of the Partridge Family''''' was a compilation album made by [[The Partridge Family]]. This double album, the last Partridge Family album put out by Bell, features 20 already-released Partridge Family songs. This album was renumbered as Arista 4021 when Bell changed into [[Arista Records|Arista]] in 1976. No new copies were printed, however - existing copies were merely shipped under the new Arista code number. Only albums released in 1974 were renumbered. [[David Cassidy]] solo LPs likewise were also renumbered. Released April 1974, Bell Records ==Track listing== Side 1: # "[[I Think I Love You]]" # "Point Me in the Direction of Albuquerque" # "She’d Rather Have the Rain" # "I Really Want to Know You" # "It’s One of Those Nights" Side 2: # "[[Doesn't Somebody Want to Be Wanted]]" # "Hello, Hello" # "I Can Feel Your Heartbeat" # "Echo Valley 2-6809" # "[[Breaking Up Is Hard to Do (song)|Breaking Up Is Hard to Do]]" Side 3: # "[[I'll Meet You Halfway]]" # "[[Oh No Not My Baby]]" # "Brown Eyes" # "Walking in the Rain" # "Only a Moment Ago" Side 4: # "[[I Woke Up In Love This Morning]]" # "Friend and a Lover" # "Am I Losing You" # "Roller Coaster" # "Looking Through the Eyes of Love" {{DEFAULTSORT:World Of The Partridge Family, The}} [[Category:The Partridge Family albums]] [[Category:1974 compilation albums]] {{1970s-compilation-album-stub}}
